snippet.title: Aurora Nova Trailer
snippet.description:
Presented by Ex Astra Studios, with custom music by Yurii Radko!

Aurora Nova is a Roguelike deckbuilder with a hint of rpg elements. Instead of a fantasy world - like in the excellent Slay the Spire, Roguebook, Banners of Ruin, or Across the Obelisk (to name a few) - Aurora Nova is a scifi, story-driven journey that takes place in the distant future.
